div.ab:
وأدام اللّه عزّه ونعماه وتكرّمه
علاه ومن حسن الپوڤپق
لا أخلاه وجــمع الرّسول الشمل بيننا عل أسر حال
وسوا ذلك تحفظ قماشي جميعه
وثلثة عشر قطعة دقيق بركين كبار أرز
بركين آخر أرز تحطّهم و وجميع
الحوائج تحطّهم ولا تفرّط فيهم أنت
وكيلي كل شي وإن امتحنوا استحوا أشحنوا انجز
لي واتب ت وأتبت وأنت بالجميع الحاج وذلك
وتسيّر لي جواب إنجاز وتكشف لي عن
المركب ترحل به وتسيّر لي المشكور
لف والله يعال يطول عمرك والحاح وصل وڤد عر عليه موپ
ويتسلّم بن من مبارك أربع فوط وعبائين
تأتيهم إلى بتاعي مسعود الّذي بقا
وتسيّر الجواب وتسلّم

wa ʾadāma ăl lāhu ʿizza hu wa naʿmāʾa hu wa takarrama takarruma hu
*** ʿalāʾa hu wa min ḥusni ăt tawfīqi
lā ʾaḫlā hu wa ǧamaʿa ăr ăš rasūlu šamla bayna nā ʿala ʾasarri ḥāl:in
wa siwā ḏālika taḥfaẓ qumāš ī ǧamīʿa hu
wa ṯalāṯaẗa ʿašara qiṭʿaẗ:an daqīq barkayni kibār ʾaruzz
barkayni ʾāḫar ʾaruzz taḥuṭṭi him wa *** wa ǧamīʿa
ăl ḥawāʾiǧi taḥuṭṭi him wa lā tufarriṭ fī him ʾanta
wakīl ī kulla šayʾ:in wa ʾini ĭmtaḥanū ĭstaḥaw ʾašḥanū ŭnǧuz
l ī wa ʾatbit ʾanta bi ăl ǧamīʿi *** ăl ḥāǧǧ *** wa ḏālika
wa tusayyir l ī ǧawāba ʾinǧāz:in wa takšif l ī ʿan
ăl markabi tarḥalu bi hi wa tusayyir l ī ăl maškūra
***lf wa ăl lāhu taʿāla yuṭawwilu ʿumra ka wa ăl ḥāǧǧu waṣala wa qad ʿazza ʿalay hi mawtu karīmati ka
wa yatasallam yatasallami bnu min mubārak:in ʾarbaʿa fuwaṭ:in wa ʿabāʾayni
tuʾtī him ʾilà bitāʿī masʿūd:ini ăllaḏī baqā
wa tusayyiri ăl ǧawāba wa tusallim ***

[To so-and-so] - May God prolong his strength, his happiness, his nobility
[.........] and his high status. [May God] not deprive him
of success. May the Prophet reunite us in the best circumstances! -
[And now to the topic:] You should keep an eye on all my fabrics,
thirteen qiṭʿa-containers of flour, two large bark-bales of rice,
and [another] two bales of rice. Put them [...] and all
the commodities [in a safe place]. Don't over charge (?) these. You are ... Und begehe bei ihnen keine Nachlässigkeit! ...
my agent in charge of everything. If they inspect [the aforesaid commodities], then you should carry the task out
on my behalf, and notify all [parties involved] that [......;] the ḥājj [......]
Send me a follow-up and inspect, on my behalf,
the boat with which you will depart. ... the cargo with which you have traveled. Send me an acknowledgment note (?) [......].
... about your sister's death [......] May God Almighty prolong your life! The ḥājj has arrived and he is sorry about your daughter's death.
Ibn Mubārak is to receive four fūṭa-waist wrappers and two ʿabāʾ-cloaks.
Give them to Bitāʿī (?) Masʿūd, who has stayed behind. Give them to the estate/possession of Masʿūd, ...
Send [me] a receipt. Give my regards [to ......].
